text: (ai rasool) kah do ki main bhee tumhaara hee aisa ek aadamee hoon (pharq itana hai) ki mere paas ye vahee aaee hai ki tumhaare maabood yakata maabood hain to vo shakhs aarazoomand hokar apane paravaradigaar ke saamane haazir hoga to use achchhe kaam karane chaahie aur apane paravaradigaar kee ibaadat mein kisee ko shareek na karen
